context.summary: Removed all hardcoded mock data fallbacks from digest services. digestService.js: getRisingCategory() returns null on DB error (not Fiction/15-books mock), getCollectiveIntelligence() genreData catch returns [] (not fake genre list), getMilestonesFeed() no longer injects fake welcome messages, getCommunityInsights() no longer appends fabricated percentage tips. simpleDigestService.js: inline risingCategory set to null, communityInsights set to [], getSimpleBookOfTheDay() returns null on error (not fake book), getSimpleIntelligence() uses real DB metrics with empty genreData/null successRates (not hardcoded numbers), catch returns null, getSimpleFeed() returns empty array when no real data, getMockVelocityData() removed. digestRoutes.js /insights queries real digest instead of hardcoded strings. No digest email will ever send fabricated marketplace statistics.
